Игра очень хорошая, с интересной атмосферой и лором, у каждого персонажа своя история и свои причины быть таким, какой он есть, а благодаря книгам можно увидеть экранизированную историю того или иного персонажа. Каждый в этой игре найдёт что-то по душе - помимо обычных персонажей есть всеми известные - Кожаное лицо, Фреди Крюгер, Лори Строуд. Игра не только атмосферная, но и заставит пошевелить мозгами - каждая погоня, каждая игра как шахматная партия - нужно просчитывать всё наперёд, чем-то (или кем-то) жертвовать ради победы, умело подбирать и реализовыввать способности и инвентарь. Стоит отметить, что разработчики не всегда выпускают удачные обновления - баги, резкий перевес в сторону выживших или маньяков. Однако стоит набраться терпения, ведь разработчики через какое-то время более-менее устаканивают ситуацию. Помимо различных скинов (красивых или нет - решать каждому), разработчики добавляют новых персонажей, новые книги, новые разрывы (батл пассы), а так же меняют старые карты, добавляя атмосферности и что-то новое, ну и перерабатывают способности слабых маньяков, чтобы они стали сильнее, а игра за них - интереснее и многообразнее. Подводя итог скажу, что к покупке рекомендую. На начальных этапах многое будет непонятно, но методом проб и ошибок,  гайдов на YouTube, можно стать вполне успешным игроком. За выживших советую начинать играть в команде минимум с двумя друзьями, главное чтобы была голосовая связь. За маньяка лишь могу посоветовать набраться терпения, так как с ходу минус 4 вы вряд ли сделаете, а выжившие любят издеваться над маньяком, а после чего ещё и писать гадости в чате. Дерзайте, Сущность ждёт вас!

En estos momentos el juego no es muy cómodo para los survivors (sobrevivientes), debido a la ultima actualización los killers (asesinos) se están aprovechando mucho de los hitboxs (golpes) falsos, se espera que la próxima semana esto se solucione pero no deja de lado que la nueva actualización en general fue un disgusto más que un gusto, para los fans del juego no es ningún problema pues esperamos esto se arregle en un tiempo pero si eres nuevo jugador quizás no notes mucho esos cambios más que los golpes falsos que tienen ahorita en las partidas debido al ping desvalanceado durante el juego, de ahí en fuera el juego esta muy bien para pasar el rato, jugarlo con amigos o distraerte de killer aunque la comunidad suele ser algo toxica y se aprovechan mucho de los principiantes, si estas pensando en comprarlo te recomendaría esperarte unas cuantas actualizaciones en lo que arreglan varias cosas para que no te lleves un mal sabor de boca y puedas disfrutar realmente de lo que es Dead By Daylight, tambien sirve que sale alguna oferta, es mejor comprar el juego si esta en oferta ya que aun debes comprar los Dlcs para poder acceder a cierto contenido cómo personajes o accesorios (solo es visual y no ofrece ventajas dentro del juego, este juego no es pay to win).

As the Hunter its elation and the thrill of the hunt. As a survivor at first its fear and panic failing skill checks, then your left alone to die on a hook again, again and again. Try, try and try again eventually you can usually rely on your team mates to save the day & escape, every survivors life is valuable...... don't let them be wasted in vain and you will succeed, time & time again.

Choose your perks wisely. Sit back and relax and enjoy the game.

Check out Ohmwrecker - dead by daylight on Youtube for guidance

This game scratches a certain itch that no other game does, that is currently on the market. The general idea behind this game is fantastic and the biggest reason why I still keep playing.

[b]Newcomers and the grind[/b]
The learning curve of DBD is manageable but you need to invest a lot of time to get at least decent at the game. Unless you have fun getting bullied every match.
The grind is off the charts. The game is stuffed with killers, survivors and perks you have to unlock via RNG. Furthermore, you have to get the perks for each character individually. And you need good perks, without them you play at a significant disadvantage. It really feels like the developers slow you down as hard as they can.

[b]Bugs, glitches, exploits[/b]
DBD is riddled with bugs, glitches and it gets worse with every patch. Some of them are minor inconveniences others game-breaking.

Just to name a few I encountered so far:
[list]
[*] Locker grab bug, which glitches you in the carry animation, even though the survivor is still running around freely because the servers decided against your grab. If that happens, as a killer you can't do anything besides using M1 hits.

[*] Invisible pallets, you can still interact with them, you just don't see them.

[*] Animation bugs of all sorts: killer or survivor t-posing around, survivors gliding all over the place while stuck in perma crouching animation, hit animations delayed or glitched out, being stuck in animations for all eternity because someone dc'd while you tried to hook or grab them, etc

[*] All sorts of exploits. For example, survivors glitching in places where it is not possible for the killer to interact with them in any way, but they can get picked up freely by other survivors or themselves.

[*]Manipulating certain animations and perk powers to break the game.

[*] And there is so much more
[/list]
The developers should shift all focus to fixing bugs and gameplay problems, instead, they are busy pumping out new cash grabs.

[b]Technical issues[/b]
This game is poorly optimized. It never ran amazingly and had its hickups. Be it fps drops, crashes, mouse input issues, or being stuck in the loading screen for all eternity. But it was manageable and major issues were actually very rare.
However, every patch introduces more problems and they are piling up steadily. It is incredibly frustrating because some issues existed for years and there is no fix in sight. 

[b]Matchmaking[/b]
Matchmaking is horrendous. Queue times are annoyingly long. Beginners draw another short stick here because they get matched with or against people that have hundreds if not thousands of hours and get absolutely demolished. 
It feels more like a random dice roll to see which opponents or teammates you get, instead of some formula that evaluates your skill level. Don't expect to be matched fairly.

[b]The community[/b]
Last but not least, the community. Dead by Daylight houses the worst community of any multiplayer game. It is unbelievably toxic.
Ragequitting, being afk, trolling, hacking, bm-ing or spamming post-match chat or your steam profile with insults. People will go out of their way to ruin your game and insult you. If you are really lucky, you might run into friendly people. The chances are unbelievably small, but they are not zero.

[h1]Good:[/h1]
1. Unique and asymmetric gameplay. So far there are no similar projects
2. Immersive atmosphere with attractive graphics and finely tuned soundtrack
3.  Stable online. The game is apparently thriving and won’t die in the next 2 years at least. The community is quite ok and not that toxic as many reviews here suggest
4. Not Pay2Win. You can live and even win without any paid content

[h1]Neutral / Controversial:[/h1]
1. Development stagnation. Devs truly love their game, so much that they are afraid to experiment. They do not introduce new mechanics, modes and focus on replicating the content quantitatively with new DLCs

[h1]Bad:[/h1]
1. Extremely hard to master, you must invest at least 100 hours to get started and have fun and 1000 hours to win more or less consistently. Even you buy all characters and addons, you still have to grind a lot in order to level them up and unlock all the crucial skills. Even after that you have to learn tons of gameplay peculiarities starting from pallet looping to memorizing every single map in detail 
2. Repetitive gameplay, gets pretty stale after around 100 hours 
3. Balance issues. Lower ranks: impossible to win as a survivor due to the overwhelming number of new players ruining the game (especially ones playing from the mobile version). Higher ranks: impossible to win a killer, since a skilled and organized team will easily fix all generators in minutes

Dead by Daylight was invented in 1545 by Grand Roman Inquisitor Caius Entitius as a form of torture for enemies of the Chuch. It is estimated that in the centuries since, the Apostolic Signatura tribunal has exposed tens of thousands of victims to Dead by Daylight, and though full records have not been unearthed, it is oft described as one of the greatest crimes against humanity ever perpetrated by a religious body.

To this day, people still participate in Dead by Daylight willingly, as a rite of passage, because they like the pain, or because they're idiots. The experience of "playing" Dead by Daylight has been compared to having fire ants funneled into one's urethra.

Крутая игра, которую убили разработчики "оптимизацией" (сравниваю с тем, что было на PS несколько лет назд).
Рекомендую ли я эту игру в 2021 году? Нет.
Поиски по  15 минут это ещё ладно, но если вы приобретаете эту игру сейчас, то будьте готовы к вылетам посреди игры из за потери пакета, а как следствие потери всех использованных ресурсов. Игра вылетела когда вы почти победили? Вместо очков крови за игру вы получите бан на несколько минут, после следующего вылета бан увеличится.
Подбор игры так же вводит в ужас. Ранги вообще никак не учитываются при подборе, 3 ранг маньяк может играть против 19-20 ранг выживающих. Не та игра, которую стоит ждать 15-20 минут, не так ли?
В остальном игра практически идеальна, но приведённые выше факторы должны стать решающими для покупки (а точнее её избежания), во всяком случае, пока не исправят ситуацию (а её не спешат исправлять).
Итог- жалею о потраченных полутора тысячах за игру (сумма которая вышла в итоге в круг).
UPD. Ситуацию с вылетами поправили, остались только проблемы с долгими поисками и балансом рангов. Но ребята движутся в правильном направлении, играть действительно стало приятнее, при текущем положении дел по скидону можно и взять.

[b]Not really the Person to write reviews, but with 600 hours on this account i might as well...[/b]

Dead by Daylight is a pretty [u]unbalanced[/u] killer vs survivor game which can be mildly infuriating sometimes. 
Not saying the game is unplayable but [u]glitches[/u] occurre regularly and if you play the game for 100 hours without experiencing one you're blessed.
[u]Devs[/u] are pretty much in touch with the community, even if they chose to ignore the feedback most of the time and just do it their own way. But after thousands of negativ reviews from people with 1000+ hours, they may listen, not for sure, but potentially they do.

[b]With that as an introduction to the game and Behavior let's get to the gameplay..[/b]

In this game 4 suvivors need to repair 5 generator, open the exit gate and run out before the super scary killer catches them. At least you're lucky if you have 4 people, when facing a freddy or spirit most people tend to [u]disconnect[/u] and leave others to their demise.
Disconnecting gives the person a small time penalty, in which they can not play another round, and they lose a ranking point. If the game had [u]an actual ranking system[/u], I could imagine this meaning something.
But still ranking is very important for some people, so in Dead by Daylight we got Rank 20 - Rank 1, but most of the time you play [u]against all the ranks anyway[/u]. You're Rank 1? Sure here are some Rank 9 people to slaughter!
Every Month [u]Ranks get reset[/u]. Yeah that's it. Would tell you 'bout rewards for reaching high ranks if there were some.

So yeah pretty good game, would 100% buy again, [spoiler]not here though 'cause it costs like [b]6€[/b] on key websites[/spoiler].
[b]Play with friends or killer, dont get too triggered, community is pretty toxic, never visit the subreddit and you're good to go![/b]

[b]Hope this review gives some people a small idea about the game! Have a nice day! :)[/b]

J'ai plus de 1000 heures de jeu sur DbD, et je peu affirmer que c'est le seul jeu que je connaisse qui devient de moins en moins bien avec le temps. Chaque "update" rend le jeu beaucoup moins jouable et beaucoup plus frustrant. Absolument tout le FUN de ce jeu à disparu grâce à l'immense incompétence des développeurs. Par contre pour sortir du contenu payant, là il a du monde, mais pour rendre le jeu sain il n'y a personne. Ce jeu est une purge monumentale !
